channel.title: Veterans of Runescape
channel.description:
I logged in, and people standing around where talking about how they've been playing for along time. Yadda Yadda, they talked alot of bullshit because they had no idea what classic was even like. Then they say "What runes for Low level alchemy again? That always escapes me." then I laughed and walked away.
So I was wondering, who here is really a veteran of Runescape? I've been playing since 2001, when did yall start?

item.title: Veterans of Runescape
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

joeman032000:

if you can remember a time when santas were 200k average price, then your a vet… lol

Lol. I was around then, but you have to remember it was a lot harder for people to make money back then. Most people worked on skills instead of merchanting. I remember the first time I made 3M off a clue, my friend took me out to dinner. Things are a lot dif from then to now. I used to love how it was back then… if only I knew half the stuff I do now… People might actually help you… You never saw anyone under 60 that was a member, and that was pushing it. A 126 was like a god… It was like your skills actually meant something, because there was fewer people, people would recognize you. I miss those days…

Read full topic

item.title: Veterans of Runescape
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

exe626:

Roughly 7m? Thats more recent. Phats didn’t get into the millions until the announcement of no more holiday drop items. They use to be 100k per, 500k a set.

Well I was about level 70 at the time, I started playing like 4 days after RS2 release. Check my other post for date.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @joeman032000 joeman032000
item.description:
@joeman032000 wrote:

ok sorry, no matter how much “better” rs2 is, I still love rsc MUCH more than rs2. Thers just something about it, and i love the sound effects. The graphics in your inventory are WAY better than rs2. I dont care how much rs2 is advanced i will always love classic and i would still play it if more people did.

item.title: Veterans of Runescape
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Don’t start flaming each other, I would rather not have this locked. joeman, You may have started in classic, but if you did you would relies Rs2 is much better. Classic had very, very beta skills that didn’t work correctly, its obsolete to Rs2 and all people did was cheat and hack in it.
